general.about: Central Park Resorts, earlier known as Central Park 2 – Belgravia, is the finest project on Sohna Road and one of the finest in all of Gurgaon. The project has 2BHK, 3BHK and 4BHK Ultra Luxury Apartments, apart from Super Luxury Penthouses. The project is spread over more than 50 acres of prime land on the main Sohna Road, and has one of the best entrance plaza. The project has central landscaped greens spread over more than 20 acres of contiguous land, with a central fountain that goes upto 40 feet high. One of the biggest USPs of the project is the tunnel, which ensures that all vehicular moment is restricted only to the basement area. There is absolutely ZERO vehicular movement on the ground within the project, hence ensuring lower pollution levels, while also ensuring more safety for the pedestrians. There is also a Kids Play area spread over more than 18,000 sq ft which has water slides and other unique features. The project also has four restaurants, of which the Italian Restaurant and a Bakery is already operational. The clubhouse is spread over more than 35,000 sq ft, hence offering the best of amenities within the project. All in all, there is no project on Sohna Road which comes close to Central Park Resorts.

Sector-65, Gurgaon located on the Golf course extension road. The locality is a fast growing locality in Gurgaon that has gained a lot of popularity in recent times among Real Estate developers. The sector also offers diverse options for leisure and entertainment activities for the residents to enjoy and relax.
